person.name: W. Craig Zwick
person.description: Elder W. Craig Zwick was sustained as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 1, 1995. He served as president of the Brazil, Brazil South, and North America Northeast Areas. He has also served in the presidencies of the Europe West and Europe Central Areas. He is currently serving as an Assistant Executive Director of both the Missionary Department and the Correlation Department.
